BioData.name: Sridhar Uyyala
BioData.summary: Software Engineer. Currently building few ideas in Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies.

Projects.name: Traffic Sign Cassifier: Udacity Project
Projects.summary: Applied deep neural networks and convolutional neural networks to classify traffic signs. Also, trained and validated a model so it can classify traffic sign images using the German Traffic Sign Dataset. After the model is trained, tested model on images of German traffic signs that found on the web.

Projects.name: Behavioral Cloning: Udacity Project
Projects.summary: Applied deep neural networks and convolutional neural networks to clone driving behavior. Trained, validated and tested the model using Keras. The model generated steering angle prediction for autonomous driving.

Projects.name: Lane Finding: Udacity Project
Projects.summary: Developed software pipeline to identify road lane boundaries in a video
